name: ScribbPuzzle
description:
ScribbPuzzle, a puzzle platformer game that requires setup to pass through 100 Levels

Hats and Trails features are able to purchase by earning coins.

From easy to the hardest levels, hope you able to pass all of them.

Best of luck!

I would love to hear your thoughts, comment below :)

__________________________________________________________

 I've been developing on this project for 2 months, issued with lots of bugs and problems but I finally able to publish it.

I also made a funny video shows how actually I dev the game, check the video bellow here :
